mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, reply, replyer) values(#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
insert into tbl_r_reply(rno, bno, r_reply, r_replyer) values(#{rno}, #{bno}, #{r_reply}, #{r_replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate() where rno = #{rno}
update tbl_board set reply_count = reply_count + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
